```{r}
# nominal data frame

nominal_features <- select(character_set, -contains("cond"), -contains("Qual"), -contains("QC"), -contains("QU"))
```

```{r}

 # turning nominal data set into a numrerical one, through one-hot encoding

dummies <- dummyVars("~.", data=nominal_features, fullRank = T)
nominal_1_hot <- data.frame(predict(dummies, newdata=nominal_features))
```
